frontmatter.title: Clone a Drupal 8 Site into Acquia DevDesktop
frontmatter.intro: Here's an easy method to clone an existing Drupal 8 site into your local environment using Acquia Dev Desktop. All you need is the site codebase and a database dump.

frontmatter.title: The Twig "Do Something" Delimiter
frontmatter.intro: The Twig "Do-Something" Delimiter is used to perform various actions. In Drupal you use this delimiter to perform tasks like conditionally displaying page regions if they are not empty.
